issue.title: [CF 444] One Lua error and Events Tab overlap
issue.body:
TMW Version: r460
1. If you deleted all events or you have some events before you installed r460 will got this error.
2. Overlap see that picture.

2x table index is NaN
<in C code>
Ace3-r1045\AceDB-3.0\AceDB-3.0-22.lua:104: in function <Ace3\AceDB-3.0\AceDB-3.0.lua:100>
TellMeWhen_Options\TellMeWhen_Options-r460.lua:4986: in function "GetEventSettings"
TellMeWhen_Options\TellMeWhen_Options-r460.lua:4843: in function "GetModuleForEventSettings"
TellMeWhen_Options\TellMeWhen_Options-r460.lua:4961: in function "LoadConfig"
<string>:"*:OnClick":5: in function <string>:"*:OnClick":1

Locals:
t = <table> {
1 = <table> {}
2 = <table> {}
n = 0
}

> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #444 | Raw

TMW-Screenshot2.PNG


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

EVENTS_HANDLERS_PLAY and EVENTS_HANDLERS_PLAY_DESC does not work, nothing shown when i mouseover that playbutton, But test event is work well.

Edited Feb 18, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

Oops. Forgot to actually put those in.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Try out r462 and toss me another screenshot of what it looks like now.

Is that error occurring every time you log in? Or did it only occur once?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Also, what WoW patch are you playing on? NaN shouldn't even be able to exist in 4.3 because of some changes blizz made...

Well, what the hell, blizzard? I just tested it and apparently they brought in back in 4.3.2. I see where the problem is now and I will look into getting it fixed, but this is starting to get really irritating, blizz...


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Attempted a fix in r463


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

@Cybeloras: Go

My WoW client is zhTW and version is 4.3.2(15211) , i think all bugs are fixed in r464.

About that overlap you can see new picture, it's looks (almost) right.

Edited Feb 18, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

Yay for the PTR being up. Ended up taking one event button out in order to have enough room for the texts. Let me know if it looks good, as I have a slightly different font on the PTR than the one that you have.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

@Cybeloras: Go

It looks perfect in r466. :D

Yesterday i try to remove my fonts, but the font size is no difference with fonts or without fonts.

By the way, i think you can change your client to zhCN on PTR now, zhCN back to earth again.

Edited Feb 19, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

Hmmm.. I'll have to give it a try in a bit. Thanks for the heads up!


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
